Hey there, my name is Ethan Fox .

I love to make progressive web apps.

I am a 19 year old developer currently in school at The University of Tennessee Knoxville. I love all things tech and frequently play quite a few games.

  • Agile ready

LINK

UniversityRecruitMe

URM has definitely taught me a lot. It has strengethened both my appreciation for and motivation to be a team player. I am a Co-Founder and Lead Developer at URM where we are bridging the gap between high school students and college. I am incredibly passionate about EdTech, I really think it can change the world.

Merchz

Built for a game that I (used to, and sometimes still) play called RuneScape. Working on a development team of two, we have completely re-built the site from the ground up to usher in the modern times. Definitely a fun project, I love the game and want to stay involved in this community!
